credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Two Friezes with Women and Sea Monsters
medium: Pen and dark brown ink, brush and sepia wash over black chalk on off white laid paper
description: Sea horse with enormously long sea body, conducted by rein of flying putto. Above sea horse's long back, woman lying apparently supporting a dish. Upon one of scrolls of body, sits putto. Below, woman with casket, resting upon sea ox.
name: Drawing
